title: Application of a distinctly bent, trinuclear, end-to-end azide bridged, mixed valence cobalt(III/II/III) complex in the fabrication of photosensitive Schottky barrier diodes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11185-11196
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01406E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sudip Bhunia, Mainak Das, Snehasis Banerjee, Michael. G. B. Drew, Partha Pratim Ray, Shouvik Chattopadhyay
A trinuclear cobalt(III)-cobalt(II)-cobalt(III) complex has been synthesized and used to fabricate a Schottky barrier diode. The conductivity of the synthesized complex-based device improves considerably in illumination conditions from the non-illuminated conditions.
